# Where are we


```{r map_authors, echo=FALSE, fig.width=9.5}
library(leaflet)
library(yaml)
map_aut <- leaflet() %>%
  setView(lng = -30.27729, lat = 46.78012, zoom = 3) %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.Toner)
# add author's popups
aut <- yaml.load_file("data/authors_info.yml")
for (i in 1:length(aut)){
  map_aut <- addMarkers(
    map_aut,
    lng=aut[[i]]$institution[[1]]$lon,
    lat=aut[[i]]$institution[[1]]$lat,
    popup=paste(aut[[i]]$given_name, aut[[i]]$family_name, sep=" ")
  )
}
map_aut  # Print the map
```
